gloss: the first or highest or most important or most ostentatious place
the first or highest or most important or most ostentatious place

a particular point in time / a preceding occurrence or cause or event / a prediction made by extrapolating from past observations / a proposition deducible from basic postulates / a stipulated condition / a subject mentioned earlier (preceding in time) / allow or plan for a certain possibility; concede the truth or validity of something / any distinct time period in a sequence of events / at that time / change the order of soldiers during a march / determine (what is to happen in certain contingencies), especially by including a proviso condition or stipulation / elaborate, as of theories and hypotheses / go around the flank of (an opposing army) / imply as a possibility / in second place / in the second place / in the third place / most unlikely or unsuitable / preceding even the first / preferred above all others and treated with partiality / rank first; used often in a negative context / rank or order as less important or consider of less value / specify as a condition or requirement in a contract or agreement; make an express demand or provision in an agreement / the front of a military formation or procession
a soldier who goes ahead of a patrol / show to a seat; assign a seat for / the position where someone (as a guard or sentry) stands or is assigned to stand
an immediate objective / an issue whose settlement is more important than anything else; and issue that must be settled before anything else can be settled / before anything else
assign to a post; put into a post / place ceremoniously or formally in an office or position / put into an office or a position
